lead_paragraph: Sophomore Daniel Evans threw three touchdown passes to lead host North Carolina State over No. 17 Florida State. Evans connected with John Dunlap on a 12-yard score with 10:36 left for the Wolfpack (3-2, 2-0 Atlantic Coast Conference). Andre Brown added 113 yards rushing, marking the second straight year Brown cracked the 100-yard mark against the Seminoles (3-2, 1-2).
